original_text: I will not think about the sins that they have done. Now that they have started to do things that are good and right, they will certainly continue to live.
korean_text: 그가 본래 범한 모든 죄가 기억되지 아니하리니 그가 반드시 살리라 이는 정의와 공의를 행하였음이라 하라

sentences.original_text: I will not think about the sins
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 죄들을 생각하지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Now that they have started to do things
they will certainly continue to live
